issue.title: opende - with solver type "world", Gazebo crashes when a simple box is inserted

content.raw:

issue.title: opende - with solver type "world", Gazebo crashes when a simple box is inserted

content.raw:
This is related with #!/osrf/gazebo/issue/351/opende-with-solver-type-world-contacts#
But, I do not know how to reopen it. So, I created as new issue.

issue.title: opende - with solver type "world", Gazebo crashes when a simple box is inserted

content.raw: I can't reproduce the issue on gazebo7.
content.html: I can't reproduce the issue on gazebo7.

issue.title: opende - with solver type "world", Gazebo crashes when a simple box is inserted
opende - with solver type "world", Gazebo crashes when a simple box is inserted

content.raw:
Issue reported for Gazebo 2, which has reached EOL. 

Can't reproduce in Gazebo 7, which is currently the earliest supported version.

Please reopen if it can be reproduced for versions 7+.
content.html:
Issue reported for Gazebo 2, which has reached EOL.

Can't reproduce in Gazebo 7, which is currently the earliest supported version.

Please reopen if it can be reproduced for versions 7+.
